headline: Lewis Ropp to join Entergy board of directors
summary: The board of directors for Entergy Corporation today announced the election of R. Lewis Ropp as an independent director, effective Aug.15. Ropp brings to Entergy's board a deep understanding of finance, capital markets, investor relations and regulatory compliance.

headline: Entergy CEO Highlights Company’s Role in Boosting Economic Growth in the Gulf South
summary: Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR) is among the 13 Best Electrical Infrastructure Stocks to Invest In. At Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR)’s 76th annual meeting, CEO Drew Marsh stressed the company’s role in driving economic growth and promoting renewable energy in the Gulf South. The business signed electric service contracts with hyperscale data centers in Louisiana and Mississippi and […]
